column1: Space Odyssey : KITCHEN : You're in the Most Beautiful Kitchen you have ever seen.
Space Odyssey : CAVE : You're in a Super Hidden Tunnel leading to the Mole People
Space Odyssey : KNIFE : A Knife sits on the table. Should you take it? ~ You use the Knife to dig through the tunnel. ~ If only you had some type of digging tool
Space Odyssey : CHEF : A very nice Chef is preparing a meal. ~ Don't Bother Me! I am busy! ~ Thank you for fixing the stove! Here's a reward for your trouble

Space Odyssey : APPRENTICE : The Apprentice is prepping for an event in the back ~ The Head Chef has a problem! The Stove won't turn on and there is a large noise coming from underneath. Can you help him?
Space Odyssey : YOGI : Yogi Problems ~ Don't Bother Me! I am busy! ~ Thank you for fixing the thing
Space Odyssey : APRON : An Apron is sprawled over the counter. ~ You are now disguised as a chef! ~ The Chef only respects other chefs
column2: so i should put on a disguise.

column1: Space Odyssey : ROCK : A Rock is laying at the opening of the cave. ~ You use the Rock to fix the Stove! ~ Maybe if they had something to close the oven door they would have more luck.
Space Odyssey : MATCH : On the floor there is a single Match. ~ You use the Match to light the stove! ~ The stove's pilot light needs to be relit.
